attributes.action: Make the benefit takers work for their money
attributes.additional_details: To stop the liberal handing of money to people who have no interest in working.  In order to recieve benefit you must complete three days of voluntary work every  week to recieve your full quota of state benefit. The remaining 2days allows you to look for real employment. This money SHOULD provide assistance for housing clothes and food and  NOT Sky TV, Playstations and Holidays!
